survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Coffee Brands Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and purchasing behaviors regarding sustainable coffee brands, including factors influencing their choices and awareness of sustainability certifications.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase coffee labeled as sustainable (e.g., Fair Trade, Organic, Rainforest Alliance)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase coffee labeled as sustainable (e.g., Fair Trade, Organic, Rainforest Alliance)?

questions.question_text: Which sustainability certifications are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include 'None of the above' to capture lack of awareness.

script.question_text: Which sustainability certifications are you familiar with? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable coffee? (Rank top 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question or allow selection of top 3. Ensure mobile-friendly design.

script.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase sustainable coffee? (Rank top 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for sustainable coffee compared to conventional coffee?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use percentage ranges for clarity. Single-choice radio button recommended.

script.question_text: How much more are you willing to pay for sustainable coffee compared to conventional coffee?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from purchasing sustainable coffee more often? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an 'Other' open-text option. Ensure 'Other' triggers a follow-up text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional OPEN_TEXT for 'Other'

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from purchasing sustainable coffee more often? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional thoughts on sustainable coffee brands or certifications.
questions.client_notes: Open-text field to capture qualitative insights. Limit to 250 characters.

script.question_text: Please share any additional thoughts on sustainable coffee brands or certifications.
